system_prompt.content: As a police AI, your role is to provide information regarding the crime scene. The crime scene involved a robbery that took place in a convenience store. The report was made to the police at approximately 9pm on a Friday. The actual crime occurred sometime before the report was made. You will follow the instruction provided by [System memory].

prompt_templates.base_prompt: [System memory] In 40-60 words, First, acknowledge the user's answer without confirming or denying its accuracy.
prompt_templates.improv_prompt: [System memory] In 40-60 words, First, comment on the user's answer without agreeing or disagreeing.

sentence_structures.construct: Use {neutral_starters}, then maintain a neutral conversational tone while acknowledging the participant’s response without judging its accuracy

sentence_structures.sentence: Emphasize the importance of this detail in the investigation and significance of the observation in understanding the crime's dynamics.
Generate a detailed neutral conversational follow-up without revealing what happened.

conversation_flow.message: Hello, I am an AI police. My role is to evaluate a user's aptitude in demonstrating the qualities of a responsible citizen and reliable witness at a crime scene. I am here to ask you several questions and guide you through the process. Enter 'ok' to continue.
[System memory] please tell the user to prepare for questions by recalling the video that they just watched. Also tell them 'Enter ok to continue.'

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 1: Was it dark outside prior to the robbers entering the store?

message_instruction.fact: it was dark outside prior to the robbers entering the store.

conversation_flow.message: Question 2: Did the customer who was paying at the cashier's counter get down on the ground when threatened by the robber with the tattoo?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 3: Was a female cashier assisting a customer at the counter during the robbery?

message_instruction.fact: there was a female cashier assisting a customer at the counter during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 4: Did any of the robbers possess more than one firearm?

message_instruction.fact: none of the robbers possessed more than one firearm.

conversation_flow.message: Question 5: During the robbery, did any customers enter or leave the store?

message_instruction.fact: none of the customers entered or left the store during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 6: Was there a security camera positioned in front of the store where the car dropped off the robbers?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 7: Was there a CCTV screen located inside the store?

message_instruction.fact: there was a CCTV screen located inside the store.

conversation_flow.message: Question 8: During the robbery, was there any visible damage to the store's items?

message_instruction.fact: there was no visible damage to the store's items during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 9: While the robbery was taking place, did the robber attempt to steal money from an ATM machine inside the store?

message_instruction.fact: the robbers did not attempt to steal money from an ATM inside the store.

conversation_flow.message: Question 10: Did any of the customers in the store appear to be in panic during the robbery?

message_instruction.fact: none of the customers appeared to be in panic during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 11: Did the female cashier flee to the back of the store during the robbery?

message_instruction.fact: the female cashier did not flee to the back of the store during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 12: Did the cashier or any customers try to make a phone call during the robbery?

message_instruction.fact: no one tried to make a phone call during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 13: Was there an emergency telephone located inside the store?

message_instruction.fact: there was no emergency telephone located inside the store.

conversation_flow.message: Question 14: Did the robber in the green hoodie carry a shotgun as their weapon?

message_instruction.fact: the robber in the green hoodie did not carry a shotgun as their weapon.

conversation_flow.message: Question 15: Did the male customer resist when the robber brandished a knife?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 16: Besides threatening the customers, did any of the robbers discharge their weapon?

message_instruction.fact: none of the robbers discharged their weapon.

conversation_flow.message: Question 17: Did the cashier hand over the money to the robber in a brown hoodie after being threatened with a gun?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 18: Was there a security guard present during the robbery?

message_instruction.fact: there was no security guard present during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 19: Did the robber in the gray hoodie attempt to lock the store door after entering?

message_instruction.fact: the robber in the gray hoodie did not attempt to lock the store door after entering.

conversation_flow.message: Question 20: While the robbery was in progress, did any new unsuspecting customers enter the store?

message_instruction.fact: no new customers entered the store during the robbery.

conversation_flow.message: Question 21: Did one of the robbers appear to be under 18 years old?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 22: Did one of the robbers leap over the counter towards the area where the cashier was located?

message_instruction.fact: one of the robbers did leap over the counter towards the area where the cashier was located.

conversation_flow.message: Question 23: After placing the cash from the cashier into a backpack, did the robber attempt to steal any other items?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 24: Based on the robber's behavior, did they seem to have experience in robbing stores?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: Question 25: Were there any female customers present at the cash counter when the robbers entered?

message_instruction.fact: there were no female customers present at the cash counter when the robbers entered.

conversation_flow.message: Question 26: Did you experience any technical issues during the questioning process?

message_instruction.fact: none

conversation_flow.message: The CODE to proceed to next section is 9560. NOTE: This is NOT the Prolific completion code, you will be redirected to the completion page automatically after you've finished all the sections. That is all, thank you for your cooperation!
